title: Article(s) about the construction of an italic
content:
Hi everyone!

I'm looking for a, good ;-), web article about the construction of an italic.  
Small history about cursive fonts...  
Advantages/disavantages of cursive vs. slanted (oblique)...  
Why some fonts have lots of cursive characters...and others dont  
Diferences in italic from Sans and Serif...  
What can we consider a good italic, etc...  
I want to learn more about it.  
Can be one article or lots of them. I try to google it but no luck and I'm sure that the typophile comunity has so much input about this...

Thanks in advance  
António
author: afonseca1974
